item.title: Mahshid add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Mahshid add a quote by مهدی اخوان ثالث / Mehdi Akhavan Sales
item.description: "لحظه ی دیدار نزدیک است باز من دیوانه ام ، مستم باز می لرزد ، دلم ، دستم باز گویی در جهان دیگری هستم های ! نخراشی به غفلت گونه ام را ، تیغ های ، نپریشی صفای زلفکم را ، دست و آبرویم را نریزی ، دل ای نخورده مست لحظه ی دیدار نزدیک است" -- مهدی اخوان ثالث / Mehdi Akhavan Sales

item.title: Mahshid add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Mahshid add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Mahshid add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Mahshid add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "The Christian does not think God will love us because we are good, but that God will make us good because He loves us." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Mahshid add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Mahshid add a quote by Max Lucado
item.description: "A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her." -- Max Lucado

item.title: Mahshid add a quote by فدریکو گارسیا لورکا
item.description: "درون هر چيزي رازي است و شعر، راز تمام چيزهاست" -- فدریکو گارسیا لورکا
